verses.verse: Moreover, when ye shall divide by lot<WH5307> <WH853> the land<WH776> for inheritance,<WH5159> ye shall offer<WH7311> an oblation<WH8641> unto the LORD,<WH3068> a holy portion<WH6944> of<WH4480> the land:<WH776> the length<WH753> shall be the length<WH753> of five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> reeds, and the breadth<WH7341> shall be ten<WH6235> thousand.<WH505> This<WH1931> shall be holy<WH6944> in all<WH3605> the borders<WH1366> thereof round about.<WH5439>

Of this<WH4480> <WH2088> there shall be<WH1961> for<WH413> the sanctuary<WH6944> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> in length, with five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> in breadth, square<WH7251> round about;<WH5439> and fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520> round about<WH5439> for the suburbs<WH4054> thereof.

And of<WH4480> this<WH2063> measure<WH4060> shalt thou measure<WH4058> the length<WH753> of five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand,<WH505> and the breadth<WH7341> of ten<WH6235> thousand:<WH505> and in it shall be<WH1961> the sanctuary<WH4720> and the most holy<WH6944> <WH6944> place.

The holy<WH6944> portion of<WH4480> the land<WH776> shall be<WH1961> for the priests<WH3548> the ministers<WH8334> of the sanctuary,<WH4720> which shall come near<WH7131> to minister unto<WH8334> <WH853> the LORD:<WH3068> and it shall be<WH1961> a place<WH4725> for their houses,<WH1004> and a holy place<WH4720> for the sanctuary.<WH4720>

And the five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> of length,<WH753> and the ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> of breadth,<WH7341> shall also the Levites,<WH3881> the ministers<WH8334> of the house,<WH1004> have<WH1961> for themselves, for a possession<WH272> for twenty<WH6242> chambers.<WH3957>

And ye shall appoint<WH5414> the possession<WH272> of the city<WH5892> five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> broad,<WH7341> and five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> long,<WH753> over against<WH5980> the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion: it shall be<WH1961> for the whole<WH3605> house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>

And a portion shall be for the prince<WH5387> on the one side<WH4480> <WH2088> and on the other side<WH4480> <WH2088> of the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion, and of the possession<WH272> of the city,<WH5892> before<WH413> <WH6440> the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion, and before<WH413> <WH6440> the possession<WH272> of the city,<WH5892> from the west<WH3220> side<WH4480> <WH6285> westward,<WH3220> and from the east<WH6924> side<WH4480> <WH6285> eastward:<WH6921> and the length<WH753> shall be over against<WH5980> one<WH259> of the portions,<WH2506> from the west<WH3220> border<WH4480> <WH1366> unto<WH413> the east<WH6921> border.<WH1366>

In the land<WH776> shall be<WH1961> his possession<WH272> in Israel:<WH3478> and my princes<WH5387> shall no<WH3808> more<WH5750> oppress<WH3238> <WH853> my people;<WH5971> and the rest of the land<WH776> shall they give<WH5414> to the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> according to their tribes.<WH7626>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Let it suffice<WH7227> you, O princes<WH5387> of Israel:<WH3478> remove<WH5493> violence<WH2555> and spoil,<WH7701> and execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and justice,<WH6666> take away<WH7311> your exactions<WH1646> from<WH4480> <WH5921> my people,<WH5971> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
Ye shall have<WH1961> just<WH6664> balances,<WH3976> and a just<WH6664> ephah,<WH374> and a just<WH6664> bath.<WH1324>

The ephah<WH374> and the bath<WH1324> shall be<WH1961> of one<WH259> measure,<WH8506> that the bath<WH1324> may contain<WH5375> the tenth part<WH4643> of a homer,<WH2563> and the ephah<WH374> the tenth part<WH6224> of a homer:<WH2563> the measure<WH4971> thereof shall be<WH1961> after<WH413> the homer.<WH2563>

And the shekel<WH8255> shall be twenty<WH6242> gerahs:<WH1626> twenty<WH6242> shekels,<WH8255> five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> shekels,<WH8255> fifteen<WH2568> <WH6240> shekels,<WH8255> shall be<WH1961> your mina.<WH4488>

This <WH2063> is the oblation<WH8641> that<WH834> ye shall offer;<WH7311> the sixth part<WH8345> of an ephah<WH374> of a homer<WH4480> <WH2563> of wheat,<WH2406> and ye shall give the sixth part<WH8341> of an ephah<WH374> of a homer<WH4480> <WH2563> of barley: <WH8184>

Concerning the ordinance<WH2706> of oil,<WH8081> the bath<WH1324> of oil,<WH8081> ye shall offer the tenth part<WH4643> of a bath<WH1324> out of<WH4480> the kor,<WH3734> which is a homer<WH2563> of ten<WH6235> baths;<WH1324> for<WH3588> ten<WH6235> baths<WH1324> are a homer: <WH2563>

And one<WH259> lamb<WH7716> out of<WH4480> the flock,<WH6629> out of<WH4480> two hundred,<WH3967> out of the fat pastures<WH4480> <WH4945> of Israel;<WH3478> for a meat offering,<WH4503> and for a burnt offering,<WH5930> and for peace offerings,<WH8002> to make reconciliation<WH3722> for<WH5921> them, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
All <WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> shall give<WH1961> <WH413> this<WH2063> oblation<WH8641> for the prince<WH5387> in Israel.<WH3478>

And it shall be<WH1961> the prince's part<WH5921> <WH5387> to give burnt offerings,<WH5930> and meat offerings,<WH4503> and drink offerings,<WH5262> in the feasts,<WH2282> and in the new moons,<WH2320> and in the sabbaths,<WH7676> in all<WH3605> solemnities<WH4150> of the house<WH1004> of Israel:<WH3478> he<WH1931> shall prepare<WH6213> <WH853> the sin offering,<WH2403> and the meat offering,<WH4503> and the burnt offering,<WH5930> and the peace offerings,<WH8002> to make reconciliation<WH3722> for<WH1157> the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> In the first<WH7223> month, in the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> thou shalt take<WH3947> a young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock<WH6499> without blemish,<WH8549> and cleanse<WH2398> <WH853> the sanctuary: <WH4720>

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH4480> <WH1818> of the sin offering,<WH2403> and put<WH5414> it upon<WH413> the posts<WH4201> of the house,<WH1004> and upon<WH413> the four<WH702> corners<WH6438> of the settle<WH5835> of the altar,<WH4196> and upon<WH5921> the posts<WH4201> of the gate<WH8179> of the inner<WH6442> court.<WH2691>

And so<WH3651> thou shalt do<WH6213> the seventh<WH7651> day of the month<WH2320> for every one<WH4480> <WH376> that erreth,<WH7686> and for him that is simple:<WH4480> <WH6612> so shall ye reconcile<WH3722> <WH853> the house.<WH1004>

In the first<WH7223> month, in the fourteenth<WH702> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> ye shall have<WH1961> the passover,<WH6453> a feast<WH2282> of seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> unleavened bread<WH4682> shall be eaten.<WH398>

And upon that<WH1931> day<WH3117> shall the prince<WH5387> prepare<WH6213> for<WH1157> himself and for<WH1157> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> a bullock<WH6499> for a sin offering.<WH2403>

And seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> of the feast<WH2282> he shall prepare<WH6213> a burnt offering<WH5930> to the LORD,<WH3068> seven<WH7651> bullocks<WH6499> and seven<WH7651> rams<WH352> without blemish<WH8549> daily<WH3117> the seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> and a kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> daily<WH3117> for a sin offering.<WH2403>
And he shall prepare<WH6213> a meat offering<WH4503> of an ephah<WH374> for a bullock,<WH6499> and an ephah<WH374> for a ram,<WH352> and a hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> for an ephah.<WH374>

In the seventh<WH7637> month, in the fifteenth<WH2568> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of the month,<WH2320> shall he do<WH6213> the like<WH428> in the feast<WH2282> of the seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> according to the sin offering,<WH2403> according to the burnt offering,<WH5930> and according to the meat offering,<WH4503> and according to the oil.<WH8081>
